    • About Sarita Dua


    My name is Sarita Dua and I am a realtor serving the Portland, Oregon, marketplace. I service the entire Portland Oregon real estate market, including surrounding communities such as Beaverton, Hillsboro, Tigard, Tualatin, West Linn, Lake Oswego, Aloha, and Hillsboro. Whether you are considering buying a home, selling a home or both, I know this area inside and out.
